<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gorilla Pound](/Feats.aspx?ID=1741) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 129 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Martial Artist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=67) (Level 8)

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7); [Gorilla Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=1733)

**Requirements**
You are in Gorilla Stance.

</column>

---

You pound your chest before slamming into your foes. Attempt an [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) check to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53), then make one gorilla slam Strike against the same target. If your Strike hits, you gain a circumstance bonus to the damage roll equal to triple the value of the target's [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) condition.

**Special** If you have this feat, while you are in Gorilla Stance, you gain a climb Speed of 15 feet.
name: Gorilla Pound
